meanings.definition: The office or term of office of a mayor.
meanings.sent1: In our town, the mayorships change every four years.
meanings.sent2: The mayorships in this city are highly respected positions.
meanings.sent3: The mayorships in the small town were so sought after that everyone wanted to be mayor.
meanings.sent4: The mayorships stood tall like beacons of leadership in the community.
meanings.sent5: Winning the mayorships was a dream come true for the young politician.

meanings.definition: The district or residence of a mayor.
meanings.sent1: The mayorships of the city are known for their beautiful architecture.
meanings.sent2: The mayorships in our town are located in the heart of downtown.
meanings.sent3: The mayorships of the neighboring towns were all close to each other.
meanings.sent4: The mayorships were like little kingdoms within the larger city.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the mayorships of different cities is a fun way to learn about local history.
